Detailed Description

Contains basic functions to read FTDI driver configuration files and conversion function of FTDI number to permisson Bitmaps.

Define Documentation

#define MAX_CONFIG_FILE_LINE_SIZE   300
 

Function Documentation

char* determine_config_parameter (  char **  file_line,
int *  port_number
) 
 

Returns a pointer to a parameter name for a given file line or NULL if no parameter could be separated. If the parameter is port related the port number will be set if not -1 will be returned inside a given port number storage. File line will be forwarded to first parameter value.

int determine_parameter_value_number (  char **  value  ) 
 

Returns parameter value located at a given string or 0 if there is no such value. String position will be forwarded to the end of the value to allow reading of furtehr values.

unsigned long get_data_bits_permission (  unsigned long  parity_type  ) 
 

Returns a permission Bitmap value for a given FTDI data bit number code.

char* get_file_line (  FILE *  config_file  ) 
 

Fetches a single line from a given configuration file, removes the NL at the end and returns a pointer to the line buffer or NULL if not successful.

unsigned long get_flowcontrol_permission (  unsigned long  flowcontrol_type  ) 
 

Returns a permission Bitmap value for a given FTDI flowcontrol code.

unsigned long get_parity_permission (  unsigned long  parity_type  ) 
 

Returns a permission Bitmap value for a given FTDI paraity code.

unsigned long get_stopbits_permission (  unsigned long  stopbits  ) 
 

Returns a permission Bitmap value for a given FTDI stop bit number code.
